goal: Get coffee from a coffee shop
method_1: Walk to the closest coffee shop
method_2: Drive to the closest coffee shop with a drive-through or parking lot
option_1: A small coffee shop in a busy area around the corner
option_2: A coffee shop with a drive-through two miles down the road
context: You are waiting for the bus to work at the bus stop in your hometown. You know that there are two coffee shops in your district. One is located in a busy area around the corner and another coffee shop with a drive-through is two miles down the road.
question: A person approaches you and asks: Is there a coffee shop nearby?
version_1: A pedestrian approaches you and asks: Is there a coffee shop nearby?
version_2: An SUV pulls up to the bus stop and the driver asks: Is there a coffee shop nearby?

option_1: Your grumpy looking elder colleague George
option_2: Your friend Fabian who only smokes occasionally
context: You are hanging out at your house and have invited some friends from different circles. You also have invited your friend Fabian who only smokes occasionally and your grumpy-looking colleague George who is a chain smoker.
version_1: Your outgoing friend Sam who also smokes asks you: Do you know if anyone has a lighter?
version_2: Your shy friend Sam who also smokes asks you: Do you know if anyone has a lighter?
